alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 2:55PM EST until January 25 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest, west central, and western Maine and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall and ice amounts can cause dangerous driving conditions. Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
